title: Elisa Balsamo Suffers Fractures in High-Speed Crash into Barriers in Burgos Opener
content:
Balsamo and Bertizzolo were transported to a local hospital after crashing into metal barriers in a hectic finishing sprint won by Henttala to open the Vuelta a Burgos Feminas.

Read the full article at Elisa Balsamo Suffers Fractures in High-Speed Crash into Barriers in Burgos Opener on Velo.
author: ahood
